name: Cloudburst
overview: On a small, unknown planet, spinning in a distant system, "Chip" Montana peers at the setting sun and readies himself for the most challenging adventure of his life. Night clouds crowd the horizon and begin to roll forward in a deafening show of thunderclaps and wild lightning strikes. Intelligent. Deadly. These are the Cloud People...and they don't like company. Now you can be "Chip" Montana, intergalactic mercenary, in the most bizarre and frightening battle of his career. Dodge acid rain, flaming-hot hailstones and lethal Cloud Hoppers as you fight to survive the 12 fearsome nights of Cloudburst.
